text:
Dear Nikolai,

 

Pleased to hear that we agree on the outstanding amount,

We agree on the deduction of the amount in future payments in order to nullify the balance.

 

Best regards,

 

Andreas​​​​ Keler

Back Office Specialist

Gas Supply & Optimization

8 Artemidos Str., Maroussi, 151 25 Athens, Greece

Cc: Operations LNG <lngops@mngtrading.com>; Kopalios, Andreas <Andreas.Kopalios@mytilineos.com>; Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com>; Anton Valyov (a.valyov@advice-expert.com) <a.valyov@advice-expert.com>; kirilov.sofia@gmail.com; ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД <tbl_ood@abv.bg>
Subject: RE: Tibiel/Myt Confirmation of Outstanding Amount

 

	You don't often get email from n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification> 

	

This message is from an EXTERNAL SENDER - be CAUTIOUS, particularly with links and attachments. 

________________________________

 

 

Dear Andras,

 

If we don’t count the prepaid amount for the quantities that we will receive in February, we confirm the outstanding amount of 10.985,57 EUR. In this case I propose that the amount will be deducted from future deals.

 



 

 

From: Keler, Andreas <Andreas.Keler@mytilineos.com <mailto:Andreas.Keler@mytilineos.com> > 
Sent: Friday, February 2, 2024 12:51 PM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Operations LNG <lngops@mngtrading.com <mailto:lngops@mngtrading.com> >; Kopalios, Andreas <Andreas.Kopalios@mytilineos.com <mailto:Andreas.Kopalios@mytilineos.com> >; Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> >; Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com <mailto:Gastrade@tibiel.com> >; Anton Valyov (a.valyov@advice-expert.com <mailto:a.valyov@advice-expert.com> ) <a.valyov@advice-expert.com <mailto:a.valyov@advice-expert.com> >; kirilov.sofia@gmail.com <mailto:kirilov.sofia@gmail.com> 
Subject: RE: Tibiel/Myt Confirmation of Outstanding Amount

 

Dear Athanasios,

 

Attached you may find our customer statement of account until 31.01.2023.

In detail : 

 

*	On 15.01.2024 we issue the invoice of 3.543,75 which deducts the due amount to 10.985,57.
*	Before that, the due amount from us was 14.529,32 which is almost identical to your ~14,527.49 EUR.

 

If that is the case, it would be convenient to use a past date of reference (i.e. 31/12/2023) in order to be in line with all the registered transactions in both of our systems.

 

Best regards,

Andreas​​​​ Keler

Back Office Specialist

Gas Supply & Optimization

Subject: Tibiel/Myt Confirmation of Outstanding Amount

 

	Some people who received this message don't often get email from akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification> 

	

This message is from an EXTERNAL SENDER - be CAUTIOUS, particularly with links and attachments. 

________________________________

 

 

Dear Andreas,

 

I hope my email finds you well!

 

Following our recent phone conversation, I wanted to confirm the outstanding amount with you. As per our finance department's records, the outstanding balance as of January 28, 2024, stands at BGN 28,413.30 or ~14,527.49 EUR.

 

Could you please verify this amount on your end and confirm if it aligns with your records?

 

Best regards,

Thanasis

 

Athanasios Karantzis  

Head of Supply and Gas Trading  of TIBIEL EOOD in Greece

M:+30 697 9073017 P: +30 216 0702506

E-mail: akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com>
